author: jstrachan
msg: fixed the XMLBeans generation mechanism so that it works nicely & creates all the beans in the right package.
Next on the list is to split the j2ee namespace into modules, which is possible on a QName by QName basis - we just need to generate the xsdconfig files from the schema files using

author: chirino
msg: Commiting the intial versions of Interceptor based remoting framwork that will be used to remote EJBs.

author: chirino
msg: Updated Component so that it does not extend StateManagable.  This allows
us to create Component implementations that do not have a managable state.
Allowed SimpleInvocations to be serializable and added a few more

author: dain
msg: Applied patch from Gianny Damour in issue Geronimo-5.
Initial revision of types defined in the J2EE Management specification.
